medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 3 days ago, initially intermittent but acutely worsened this afternoon. The pain is described as lower abdominal, accompanied by fevers to 102.3, chills, and nausea/vomiting. The patient has had decreased PO intake and no bowel movements for 3 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of diverticulosis, last colonoscopy showed diverticulosis with polyp removal.
